required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Second Line ColoRectal Cancer Therapy in Combination With Combination of FOL- Folinic Acid(Leucovorin), F - Fluorouracil and OX - Oxaliplatin (FOLFOX)
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Compare the Efficacy of AZD2171 in Combination With 5-fluorouracil, Leucovorin, and Oxaliplatin (FOLFOX) and the Efficacy of Bevacizumab in Combination With FOLFOX in the Second-line Treatment of Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of AZD2171 in combination with FOLFOX to the efficacy of bevacizumab in combination with FOLFOX, in the second-line treatment of patients with metastatic colorectal cancer

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Randomisation to data cut-off date of November 2007
primary_outcome.description: Number of months from randomisation to the earlier date of objective progression or death

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomisation to data cut-off date of November 2007
secondary_outcome.description: Per RECIST Criteria (V1.0) and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), >= ##% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR. Confirmed Partial Response (PR) or Complete Response (CR) as defined by RECIST.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomisation to data cut-off date of 30 January 2009
secondary_outcome.description: Number of months from randomisation to the date of death from any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality Of Live(QOL) : Time to Worsening of Tissue Oxygen Index (TOI)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomisation to data cut-off date of November 2007
secondary_outcome.description: Time when a sustained clinically important deterioration in TOI has been recorded: derived from the FACT-C questionnaires

secondary_outcome.measure: QOL: Time to Worsening of Treatment-free Survival (TFS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomisation to data cut-off date of November 2007
secondary_outcome.description: Time when a sustained clinically important deterioration in TFS has been recorded: derived from the Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Colorectal (FACT-C) questionnaires

secondary_outcome.measure: QOL: Time to Worsening of Clear Cell Sarcoma (CCS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomisation to data cut-off date of November 2007
secondary_outcome.description: Time when a sustained clinically important deterioration in CCS has been recorded: derived from the FACT-C questionnaires

secondary_outcome.measure: QOL: Time to Worsening of FACT Colorectal Cancer Symptom Index(FCSI)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomisation to data cut-off date of November 2007
secondary_outcome.description: Time when a sustained clinically important deterioration in CCS has been recorded: derived from the FACT-C questionnaires

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis of colon or rectal cancer,
- Received prior systemic therapy for cancer,
- Cancer must have progressed during or after first treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- Prior treatment with a VEGF inhibitor,
- Poorly controlled hypertension

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: If a Study Site, or an investigator, requests permission to publish data from this study, any such publication (including oral presentations) is to be agreed with AstraZeneca prior to publication.
